labels.label: 2. add timestamp to every record and group
1. Get API response with JSON for all currencies including non-crypto currencies
3. Save JSON as AVRO to HDFS
HDFS - Master dataset is stored in directory: /user/vagrant/projekt/masterdataset/crypto_rates which is saved in parameter: master_dataset_path
Requirements / parameters

Get data about rates of cryptocurrencies and save to HDFS.
Details: 1. Every 10 seconds API request is sent. 2. JSON response contains 17 crypto and 150+ non-crypto currencies rates in USD. 5. Timestamp is copied to every JSON array element, 6. JSONs are merged before saving to HDFS every minute, 7. Merged JSON is converted to AVRO - every row contains information about: timestamp, cryptocurrency name, it's rate in USD, symbol, type, short name.
Readme - details about flow
